name: Sunniva Inc.
description: Sunniva Inc. is a Canadian-based company engaged in the production and distribution of cannabis products. Founded in 2014, Sunniva focuses on providing high-quality cannabis through its state-of-the-art facilities and innovative cultivation techniques. The company operates a greenhouse facility in California that utilizes advanced technology to enhance the growing process, ensuring optimal conditions for producing premium cannabis flower. Sunniva is committed to sustainability and aims to set new standards in the cannabis industry by implementing eco-friendly practices in its operations. In addition to cultivation, Sunniva has developed a range of cannabis oil products and wellness items designed to meet the diverse needs of consumers. The company's mission is to deliver safe, reliable, and effective cannabis products while contributing positively to the communities it serves. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Sunniva continues to explore new product formulations and therapeutic applications of cannabis to improve quality of life for its customers.

seo.meta_description: Explore Sunniva Inc., a leader in the cannabis industry, providing premium cannabis flower and innovative wellness products. Discover our commitment to sustainability and quality.

faq.question: What does Sunniva specialize in?
faq.answer: Sunniva specializes in the production and distribution of high-quality cannabis products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sunniva?
faq.answer: Dr. Anthony Holler is the CEO of Sunniva Inc.

faq.question: Where is Sunniva headquartered?
faq.answer: Sunniva is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What types of products does Sunniva offer?
faq.answer: Sunniva offers cannabis flower, cannabis oils, and wellness products.
